So no one had thought it out of the ordinary when a female Snorlax who had contracted the pokérus reported that she was suffering from an increase in appetite and had gained a fair bit of weight. Most Snorlax seemed to stabilize at a certain weight at some point in their lives, but it wasn't uncommon for it to change here or there. Just like that, they had an epidemic on their hands. 

While the additional weight of the afflicted did not seem to come with any additional drawbacks, much like it does not for the normal Snorlax.
